testcase.name: Given I set up the LTI consumer key and shared secret if not already done(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded

When I launch random "basic-lti-launch-request" LTI request with role "Instructor" and outcome URL "" and document target "window"(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
Then I am on the LTI Mapping Page(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
When I click the 'New Class' mapping button(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
Then I am on a New Class page(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
When I create new class with random name(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
Then I am on the LTI Mapping Page(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
When I click the 'Class Homepage' mapping button(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
Then I am on the Class Homepage(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
When I navigate to the "Content Repository" of current class(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
And I choose creating new assignment in "Default Unit" unit from the main dropdown button(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
Then Assignment Editor is opened(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
When enter Assignment name "MO-3128 Assignment"(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
When I click on the questions tab(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
And I click the new question button(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
And I create question "Regrading" with label "Regrading"(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
And I click Response Area button to open the dialog and assert that the Choose Question Type page is visible(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
When I choose "Mathematical Formula" link from the dialog and complete the correct answer(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
And I click OK(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
Then I see the "Mathematical Formula" Question Widget in the question text section(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
And I save & close the new question in the assignment editor(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
When I choose to create a new question from the Add dropdown button(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
And I create question "Regrading 2" with label "Regrading 2"(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
And I click Response Area button to open the dialog and assert that the Choose Question Type page is visible(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
When I choose "Mathematical Formula" link from the dialog and complete the correct answer(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
And I click OK(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
Then I see the "Mathematical Formula" Question Widget in the question text section(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
And I save & close the new question in the assignment editor(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
When I save & close the assignment on the questions page(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
Then I see summary of the assignment(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
When I save and close the assignment summary details(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
Then I am on the Class Homepage(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
When I start the "MO-3128 Assignment" assignment in "Default Unit" unit(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
And I use "Next" button to navigate to "Question 2"(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
And I submit the assignment(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded

Then I see the submission report with warning text "Warning: There appears to be errors in one or more of your answers."(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
When I submit the assignment again(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
Then my score 0 out of 2 (0 %) is shown in a grade report(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
And quit and save the assignment(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
When I navigate to the "Class Grades" in "Gradebook" of current class(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
Then I am on the Class Grades page(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
And I select "MO-3128 Assignment - Homework/Quiz" in "Assignments" selection list(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
And I select "Other users with grades" in "List" selection list(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
And I select "Earliest" in "Results" selection list(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
And I click the Search button(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
When I click the grade for the selected assignment(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
Then I see the test record details of "MO-3128 Assignment" for the current user(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
And I see that the regrade button for question 1 is enabled(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
And I see that the regrade button for question 2 is enabled(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
When I click the Regrade Question button for question 2(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
Then I am on the Regrading page(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
And I verify the timestamps are in the correct format(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
And I see the regrading in progress spinner(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
And I wait until regrading is complete(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
When I select revision number 1(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
And I submit all selected grades(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
Then I see the test record details of "MO-3128 Assignment" for the current user(Scenario: Verify that an assignment question beyond the first position can be regraded
